description: Rapidly create an instance on Google Compute

name.description: Name of the machine to create

imagefamily.description: Which image family to launch the instance from

imageproject.description: The project to which the specified image family belongs

sizegb.description: The size of the VM disk (in GB)

machinetype.description: The type of the machine to create

staticip.description: If true it will allocate a static IP for the machine

network.description: The network to connect the VM to

zone.description: The zone where your instance resides

credential.description: Path to a service account credentials file
